member.name: T:GitReleaseManager.Core.Configuration.CloseConfig
member.summary: Class for holding configuration values used during milestone closing. This class cannot be inherited.

member.name: P:GitReleaseManager.Core.Configuration.CloseConfig.IssueComments
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether adding issue comments is enabled or not.

member.name: P:GitReleaseManager.Core.Configuration.CloseConfig.IssueCommentFormat
member.summary: Gets or sets the issue comment format to use when commenting on issues.

member.name: P:GitReleaseManager.Core.Configuration.Config.Close
member.summary: Gets or sets the close configuration values.
